inquisitor.name: Inquisitor
inquisitor.description: An inquisitor trained in dealing with Psychic beings.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Courage until the end of the round.

terror.name: Terror
terror.description: Target enemy model within 12" gets -1 Courage until the end of the round.

control.name: Control
control.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately take a shoot action.

interrogate.name: Interrogate
interrogate.description: Target enemy unit within 12" suffers -1 Accuracy with its next shooting attack.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may target Character units even if they are protected by enemy units.

retribution.name: Retribution
retribution.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).
